attributes.action: Stop the local Authorities and Housing Associations provididing houses to young single parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The provision of housing and grants to furnish them for young single mothers only helps fuels the problem of these young girls getting pregnant, when they move into one of these houses associated ani social behaviour follows in the form of Loud music at all hours, young boys grouping around and in the houses again more noise and trouble, yes i have had two upto now next door and we have had it all, even broken windows and my wife assaulted by 15 year old male.
